about_the_game:
◆Scenario Summary

The latest in the "Heroine Pinch" series brought to you by the futanari circle "Circle Sigma"!

Witch's Banquet... ... ... ☆... ☆... ☆... ☆... ☆... †The curtain opens.

Volume of erotic scenes
　11 erotic scenes
　22 basic erotic CGs
　A total of 362 erotic CGs, including the difference!

　We want to deliver this to all futanari lovers! The best volume in the series!

Synopsis.

It has been 1000 years since evil demons began to appear in this world.
Humans have offered their "souls" to demons instead of having their wishes granted.
The maidens who fight against the evil demons are called Witch Knights.

Anna, a new witch of the Witch Knights, went to the demon god's stronghold, the Demon Hall, to meet her master as usual.
She went with her mentor, Rain, to the Demon God's stronghold. But .......
Anna is suddenly attacked by Rain.
And it turns out to be her nemesis, Lilith, the mother of demigods.

Anna is attacked by Lilith, who has transformed into a double form, and loses consciousness.
And then... What appears before her, trapped in the mansion of the demigod....
Mami, Rain's aide, whose soul has been stolen by the demon god...

Anna, who has been given a magical tool called "Mara," which can grant any sexual wish,


Then, she is attacked by her friends who have their souls stolen by the Demon God. ......
Will Anna be able to rescue her friends from the house of the demon god?

Character Introductions


☆Anna

The protagonist of this work.
A good witch who defeats evil demons.
She is one of the "Witch Knights," as she is commonly called.
She was caught in the house of the evil god,
She is given a cursed magical device that makes her penis grow, and is forced to commit lewd acts in order to leave the mansion.
[/img] ☆ Mami One of the Witch Knights, who has lived for many years as Rain's right hand man. She appears before Anna in the Hall of the Demon God, She performs lewd acts. Her body is said to be controlled by the Demon God... but is she really... [img{STEAM_
☆ Rain

Feared as the strongest witch.
Anna's mentor.
On her way to the house of the demon god to defeat him,
Anna's virginity is taken away from her.
What is his true intention?

☆ Mami

One of the Witch Knights, who has lived for many years as Rain's right hand man.
She appears before Anna in the Hall of the Demon God,
She performs lewd acts.
Her body is said to be controlled by the Demon God... but is she really...
[img{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/ac345fbd9b9e047fd38a687524d55c5e.jpg]
☆Emi

A mysterious girl who was chased by a demon god and saved by Anna.
She meets Anna again at the house of the demon god where Anna was captured, and suddenly says that she will take care of Anna's sexual and personal needs. What is her true identity?

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, Sexual scenes.

It also contain non-consensual sex and sex involving non-human.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

fullgame.name: The Witch Knight Anna　-The Black Serpent and the Golden Wind-

name: The Witch Knight Anna The Black Serpent and the Golden Wind　Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10,Windows11
  • Processor: 2GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU compatible with DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Over 400 total visuals!! A good witch who saves people from demons. Also known as the Witch Knight. Anna, a new witch captured in the house of the demon god, is cursed to become a futanari. Anna's adventure in the other world begins in order to save her friends! Will she be able to save her friends?
